plot: A documentary follows a writer as they write a TV play based on their experiences in an Irish town. This is followed by a production of their play.
plot_en: A documentary follows a writer as they write a TV play based on their experiences in an Irish town. This is followed by a production of their play.
plot_es: A documentary follows a writer as they write a TV play based on their experiences in an Irish town. This is followed by a production of their play.
title: Play Next Door
